title: What IKEA’s Top 3 Most-Searched Items Tell Us About 2025 (And The Hacks We Swear By)
description: Getting organized makes the shortlist when it comes to New Year’s resolutions, and one look at the top IKEA product searches in 2024 proves it. The three most-searched items all have one big thing in common and that’s storage. It makes sense since consumers today desire functional, calm, and aesthetically pleasing homes more than ever. According to the IKEA Life at Home Report 2023, 40% of people feel most at peace when their homes are organized. title: How a $3 Clock Became a Priceless Personalized Gift
description: As the school year draws to a close, parents often find themselves searching for the perfect way to say thank you to their children’s teachers. Marleen K. and her young son have come up with a charming and budget-friendly solution using the IKEA TROMMA wall clock. “My youngest son is going from preschool to kindergarten, so we needed a simple but nice farewell gift for his very nice teachers,” Marleen explains.
